response.overview: Zed, a young British rapper, is about to start his first world tour, when a crippling illness strikes him down, forcing him to move back in with his family. He tries to find himself between an international music career and Pakistani family traditions.
response.title: Mogul Mowgli

titles.title: مغل मोगली
titles.type: Opening Credits Title: "Mogul" in Urdu, "Mowgli" in Hindi
